title: On determinant of checkerboard colorable virtual knots
abstract:
For classical knots, it is well known that their determinants mod $8$ are
classified by the Arf invariant. Boden and Karimi introduced a determinant of
checkerboard colorable virtual knots. We prove that their determinant mod $8$
is classified by the coefficient of $z^2$ in the ascending polynomial which is
an extension of the Conway polynomial for classical knots.
